name: Decorous Harmony
description: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, Flying Cloud Flag Formation will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: When $[A1607], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color> will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color> will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
